gigacasting.definition: Single-piece aluminum casting replacing 70-100+ stamped parts

unboxed_process.definition: Building car from separate subassemblies that dock together at end

architecture_48v.definition: Higher voltage electrical system replacing 12V for accessories
architecture_48v.benefit: Smaller wires, less copper, more headroom for accessories

structural_battery.definition: Battery pack as load-bearing chassis element

china_rare_earth_embargo.mitigation: Build non-China processing, use induction motors

direct_sales_model.reason: Simpler product, no dealer education needed

wheel_hub_motors.concept: Motor inside each wheel, no drivetrain

vehicle_to_grid.part_impact: Adds bidirectional inverter, smart charging ECU

electric.expensive_part_insight: Battery = 32% of total cost, but dropping 12%/year

hydrogen.expensive_part_insight: Fuel Cell Stack + H2 Tanks = 34% of cost (platinum + carbon fiber)

key_insights.title: Manufacturing cost parity in 2026
key_insights.detail: EVs will cost less to manufacture than ICE by 2026-2027

key_insights.title: Gigacasting eliminates 100+ parts
key_insights.detail: Single aluminum casting replaces 70-100 stamped & welded parts

key_insights.title: EV repairability is a challenge
key_insights.detail: Only 35% of mechanics can service EVs vs 95% for ICE

key_insights.title: China dominates critical minerals
key_insights.detail: 90% of rare earth processing, 65% of graphite, 60% of refining

key_insights.title: EV batteries have valuable second life
key_insights.detail: 80% capacity at retirement → 10 more years in grid storage

key_insights.title: LFP batteries are game-changing
key_insights.detail: No cobalt, 3000 cycles, $90/kWh - dominating standard range

key_insights.title: EVs disrupting dealer business model
key_insights.detail: 67% drop in service revenue per vehicle

key_insights.title: Tesla profits $9,000 per vehicle
key_insights.detail: Legacy OEMs losing money on EVs due to manufacturing inefficiency

key_insights.title: Solid-state batteries by 2027-2030
key_insights.detail: 2x energy density, 10-min charging, near-zero fire risk
